title: Не в деньгах счастье
overview: The main character is a brilliantly successful lady of about 35 years old. She is devilishly energetic, quick-tempered, extravagant, passionate. She is the owner of several jewelry businesses. Her main passion in life is to earn money and painting. Once, the case brings her a surprise - the opportunity to purchase a proverbial of the famous painting by Modigliane "Portrait of the Unknown". A true connoisseur of painting will not miss such an opportunity. But not so simple. Luck itself going into the hands, turns into serious problems. And now everything is at stake - business, friends, the usual way of life, and, finally, life itself. Surveillance, chasing, assassination, betrayal of loved ones, the loss of friends and much more remains to be put on the shoulders of the heroine of the film. But, having gone through all these trials, she gains the main thing
